High Quality, Stronger support, Socially Responsibly Made Pressure Relief Cushion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for chronic back, hip or knee pain
reviews.reviewText: I always thought that this kind of cushion was for lower back pain from sitting at a computer, but it is so amazing for knee and hip pain!!!My knees are super messed up. The pain radiates up to my hip which makes it hard to sit comfortably. This cushion offers fantastic pain relief for me!!! It's great at my desk, but also at the dining room table and in the car. I thought that the seats in our car were very comfortable, but this offers a big step up in relief there too. Try it; you'll like it!!!I think I'll get one of these for my mother-in-law too, because she had a not very successful back surgery and it's hard for her to sit, especially on a hard surface. She tried my cushion and was surprised at how much pain relief it gave her. I'm sure anyone in your life with pain in their lower half would appreciate this cushion as a gift. They just don't know how much they need it because they haven't tried it yet!!I would say this cushion sits nicely in the balance between firm support and soft cushion. Too soft and it wouldn't give pain relief. Too hard and your rear end might object. I like the size too. Our dining room table is an antique and the the chairs are quite narrow. It fits just fine, but I think it would accommodate a larger chair too. It's absolutely perfect in our tiny commuter car, but great in our big SUV too. The surface on top seems well made and so does the bottom of the cushion. It doesn't slide around on our hard dining room chair. I think it will hold up for quite a while.I can't see any flaws and the price is competitive. I would buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Memory Foam Seat cushion
reviews.reviewText: A little oak ward design, however, it does make setting more comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great cushion for pain relief
reviews.reviewText: My mother has a recliner that she loves but it’s gotten hard and uncomfortable over the years. This cushion has made it possible for her to sit in it for long periods again! It’s thick and soft with good support and a quality cover. The bottom has non-slip grippy ‘dots’ and the cover unzips for washing. The cushion is molded for comfort and even includes a gap for tailbone relief for people who have issues with their tailbones. Adding to its ergonomics is a slight forward tilt to keep the spine aligned. It’s comfortable on her recliner and would be luxurious for office chairs and might even work on a wheelchair in a pinch. (I’m pretty sure wheelchair cushions are slightly larger, but it varies). My mother loves this cushion so I recommend it highly for people who need a bit more cushion where they’re sitting!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I am obsessed with this cushion
reviews.reviewText: I have this cushion on my not so traditional computer chair and in no time it's saving me a world of back pain and comfort issues. I can now sit for my 2 hour online class without repositioning 15 times. I am SO HAPPY with this seat cushion. Don't hesitate you'll love this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Less pain on long trips
reviews.reviewText: We do a lot of traveling by car. As we have aged we have noticed that on long trips in the car sitting becomes painful after a few hours. This cushion helps with making the ride much more comfortable. My wife used it on a 12 hour round trip last week and said she didn't experience pain in her lower back or hips. Now she insists on using it and I have to buy myself another one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Really helps my back. Comfortable to sit on and stays put on the chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I'm very happy with this cushion. It is one of the most comfortable and pain relieving ones I have gotten. I have an auto immune bone disease and am generally uncomfortable. This cushion has hills and valleys in all the right areas. The only thing I don't love is that the texture has little holes in it like a jersey material. Anything and everything gets stuck in them if you just look at it wrong. I ended up putting a pillow case over it, which I don't love for the look of it. I'd be super stoked if they busted out different covers to buy for it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought the seat cushion for my office chair because we have really hard chairs at work and I sit all day. I really loved the cushion at first but now it’s getting a little wonky.. one side of the cushion sits higher than the other side now. It’s like one side is starting to go flat. I hope it holds up because I really liked this cushion at first. I guess only time will tell..
